languages.text: "А если вы вдруг передумаете на счет моего предложения — я всегда рядом, на мостике. Только окликните, и я приду, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "А если вы вдруг передумаете на счет моего предложения — я всегда рядом, на мостике. Только окликните, и я приду, шерин".

languages.text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."
languages.original_text: "А если вы вдруг передумаете на счет моего предложения — я всегда рядом, на мостике. Только окликните, и я приду, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."
"And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."
"And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."
"And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

languages.text: “关于我之前的提议，如果你改主意的话，随时可以来舰桥找我。只要你开口，我就会来你身边，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “关于我之前的提议，如果你改主意的话，随时可以来舰桥找我。只要你开口，我就会来你身边，亲爱的。”

languages.text: «Y si cambia de idea sobre mi propuesta, siempre puede encontrarme cerca, en el puente. Solo tiene que decirlo y acudiré a su lado, shereen».
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Y si cambia de idea sobre mi propuesta, siempre puede encontrarme cerca, en el puente. Solo tiene que decirlo y acudiré a su lado, shereen».

languages.text: 「アタシはいつも橋の辺りにいるから、気が変わったら教えてよ。一言言ってもらうだけで手を貸すよ、シェリーン」
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「アタシはいつも橋の辺りにいるから、気が変わったら教えてよ。一言言ってもらうだけで手を貸すよ、ダーリン」

languages.text: « Si jamais vous changez d'avis en ce qui concerne ma proposition, vous savez où me trouver. Un mot de votre part, et j'accourrai aussitôt, shereen. »
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Si jamais vous changez d'avis en ce qui concerne ma proposition, vous savez où me trouver. Un mot de votre part, et j'accourrai aussitôt, shereen. »

languages.text: "Und solltet Ihr wegen meines Vorschlags Eure Meinung ändern, findet Ihr mich immer hier in der Nähe auf der Brücke. Ein Wort von Euch genügt, und ich komme, Shereen."
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Und solltet Ihr wegen meines Vorschlags Eure Meinung ändern, findet Ihr mich immer hier in der Nähe auf der Brücke. Ein Wort von Euch genügt, und ich komme, Shereen."

languages.text: "Eğer teklifim hakkında fikrini değiştirecek olursan beni daima köprüde, civarda bulabilirsin. Çağırdığın gibi gelirim şirinim."
languages.original_text: "And if you change your mind about my proposal, you can always find me nearby on the bridge. Just say the word and I'll come, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer teklifim hakkında fikrini değiştirecek olursan, beni daima köprüde, yakınlarda bulabilirsin. Çağırsan gelirim şirinim."
